de.interactive_instruments.etf.component.loaders

Interface ItemRegistry

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NullItemRegistry

    public interface ItemRegistry
    A registry interface to search for specific objects that are created at runtime and to inform requesting objects about the state changes of their dependencies.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ItemRegistry.DependencyChangeListener
      Inform observers about the item states on which they depend.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deregister(java.util.Collection<? extends EidHolder> items)
      Deregister items Clients that are dependent on these elements are informed about the de-registration.
      void deregisterCallback(ItemRegistry.DependencyChangeListener listener)
      Deregister a listener Note: if the client has registered items, it should have called the method deregister(Collection) before.
      EidHolderMap<? extends Dto> lookup(java.util.Collection<EID> ids)
      Look up specific objects that are created at run time.
      EidHolderMap<? extends Dto> lookupDependency(java.util.Collection<EID> dependencies, ItemRegistry.DependencyChangeListener callbackListener)
      Look up specific objects that are created at run time.
      void register(java.util.Collection<? extends Dto> items)
      Register items Objects that are dependent on these elements are informed about the registration.
      void update(java.util.Collection<? extends Dto> items)
      Update items Clients that are dependent on these elements are informed about the update.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        void register(java.util.Collection<? extends Dto> items)
        Register items Objects that are dependent on these elements are informed about the registration.
        Parameters:
        items - items to register
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the item is already registered

      • deregister

        void deregister(java.util.Collection<? extends EidHolder> items)
        Deregister items Clients that are dependent on these elements are informed about the de-registration. Note: does not remove the ItemRegistry.DependencyChangeListener, that may have been created when lookupDependency(Collection, DependencyChangeListener) has been called. See deregisterCallback(DependencyChangeListener) for that case. Items that are not found are silently ignored.
        Parameters:
        items - items to deregister

      • update

        void update(java.util.Collection<? extends Dto> items)
     throws de.interactive_instruments.exceptions.ObjectWithIdNotFoundException
        Update items Clients that are dependent on these elements are informed about the update. If the dependency was previously de-registered, an ItemRegistry.DependencyChangeListener.fireEventDependencyResolved(Dto) is fired, otherwise an ItemRegistry.DependencyChangeListener.fireEventDependencyUpdated(Dto) event.
        Parameters:
        items - items to deregister
        Throws:
        de.interactive_instruments.exceptions.ObjectWithIdNotFoundException - if one of the items were not found

      • lookupDependency

        EidHolderMap<? extends Dto> lookupDependency(java.util.Collection<EID> dependencies,
                                             ItemRegistry.DependencyChangeListener callbackListener)
        Look up specific objects that are created at run time. If the dependencies can be resolved, they are returned directly. The listener is informed when an object on which he depends disappears ( ItemRegistry.DependencyChangeListener.fireEventDependencyDeregistered(Class, EID) callback). If a dependency is unknown, the listener is informed ( ItemRegistry.DependencyChangeListener.fireEventDependencyResolved(Dto) callback) as soon as the object is available.
        Parameters:
        dependencies - dependencies the requesting object depends on
        callbackListener - the callback interface of the requesting object
        Returns:
        known dependencies

      • deregisterCallback

        void deregisterCallback(ItemRegistry.DependencyChangeListener listener)
        Deregister a listener Note: if the client has registered items, it should have called the method deregister(Collection) before.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to remove

      • lookup

        EidHolderMap<? extends Dto> lookup(java.util.Collection<EID> ids)
                            throws de.interactive_instruments.exceptions.ObjectWithIdNotFoundException
        Look up specific objects that are created at run time. If one of the requested objects was not found, an ObjectWithIdNotFoundException is thrown. See lookupDependency(Collection, DependencyChangeListener) for a callback interface.
        Parameters:
        ids - dependencies the requesting object depends on
        Returns:
        known dependencies
        Throws:
        de.interactive_instruments.exceptions.ObjectWithIdNotFoundException
